title: Ozone bond energies from enthalpy of reaction

content.question:
Type of Bond 
Average Bond Enthalpy <math alttext="in kilojoules per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>kJ/mol)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 

<math alttext="oxygen oxygen single bond" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>O</mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></math> 
150 

<math alttext="oxygen oxygen double bond" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>O</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></math> 
500 

<math alttext="2 O 3 gas reacts to produce 3 O 2 gas. delta H naught sub r x n, end sub, equals negative 300 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>∘</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>300</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

The conversion of ozone to diatomic oxygen is represented by the equation above. Based on the data in the table above, what is the approximate average bond enthalpy for the oxygen-to-oxygen bonds in ozone?
